title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: A beginner's guide to Python, covering variables, data types, loops, and functions. No prior experience needed.

title: Creative Watercolor Painting
description: Explore watercolor techniques, color theory, and composition. Create beautiful landscapes and still life paintings.

title: Algebra Fundamentals
description: Master the core concepts of algebra, including equations, inequalities, and graphing.

title: Fun with Phonics Club
description: A weekly club to build reading skills through fun games and activities.

title: One-Time Workshop: Build a Volcano
description: A hands-on science workshop where students will build and erupt their own model volcano.

title: Advanced Java Concepts
description: Deep dive into Java streams, multithreading, and design patterns. For experienced programmers.

title: Digital Art with Procreate
description: Learn to draw and paint on your iPad using the Procreate app. Covers layers, brushes, and effects.

title: Geometry Genius Club
description: Explore shapes, angles, and proofs in our weekly geometry club.

title: Intro to Web Development (HTML/CSS)
description: Build your first website! Learn the basics of HTML for structure and CSS for styling.

title: Story Writing Workshop
description: A one-time session on crafting compelling characters and plots.

title: Biology Basics: The Living Cell
description: An introductory course on cell structure, function, and division.

title: Sculpture and Pottery Club
description: Get your hands dirty with clay! Learn hand-building and wheel-throwing techniques.

title: Pre-Calculus Prep
description: Strengthen your math skills to get ready for Calculus. Covers trigonometry and advanced functions.

title: Scratch Programming for Kids
description: Create interactive stories, games, and animations with the Scratch visual programming language.

title: Public Speaking Practice
description: A one-time workshop to build confidence and skills for effective public speaking.

title: Chemistry Fun Lab
description: A club for young scientists to conduct safe and exciting chemistry experiments.

title: History of Ancient Rome
description: Explore the rise and fall of the Roman Empire, from Republic to Empire.

title: Introduction to Music Theory
description: Learn the fundamentals of music, including scales, chords, and rhythm.

title: Minecraft Modding with Java
description: Learn Java programming by creating your own custom mods for Minecraft.

title: Photography Basics
description: A one-time workshop on composition, lighting, and camera settings. Bring any camera!

title: Physics: Motion and Forces
description: Understand Newton's laws and apply them to real-world scenarios.

title: Debate Club
description: Sharpen your critical thinking and argumentation skills in our weekly debate club.

title: Spanish for Beginners
description: An introduction to the Spanish language, focusing on conversational skills.

title: Statistics and Probability
description: Learn to analyze data, understand distributions, and calculate probabilities.

title: One-Time Workshop: Intro to 3D Printing
description: Design a simple 3D model and see it come to life on a 3D printer.

title: World Geography Club
description: Explore different countries and cultures each week in this interactive club.

title: Guitar Lessons for Beginners
description: Learn basic chords, strumming patterns, and your first few songs on the acoustic guitar.

title: Creative Coding with p5.js
description: Create interactive visual art and animations using JavaScript and the p5.js library.

title: Marine Biology Exploration
description: Discover the wonders of the ocean, from coral reefs to the deep sea.

title: French Conversation Club
description: Practice speaking French in a relaxed, conversational setting. Intermediate level.

title: Calculus I
description: A comprehensive introduction to differential calculus, including limits, derivatives, and applications.

title: Book Lovers Club
description: A weekly club for young readers to discuss their favorite books and discover new ones.

title: The American Revolution
description: A deep dive into the causes, events, and consequences of the American Revolutionary War.

title: Piano for Beginners
description: Learn to read music and play simple tunes on the piano or keyboard.

title: One-Time Workshop: Rocket Science
description: Build and launch your own water-powered rocket while learning about propulsion.

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Create your first 2D platformer game using the Unity engine and C# scripting.

title: Drawing Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of drawing, including line, shape, form, and perspective. A great art course.

title: Mandarin for Beginners
description: An introduction to Mandarin Chinese, focusing on tones, basic vocabulary, and characters.

title: Math Olympiad Training Club
description: A club for advanced students to tackle challenging competition-style math problems.

title: Creative Writing: Poetry
description: Explore different forms of poetry and find your own poetic voice.

title: Astronomy: Stars and Galaxies
description: Journey through the cosmos and learn about the life cycle of stars, black holes, and galaxies.

title: World War II History
description: A comprehensive study of the major events, figures, and impacts of World War II.

title: Choir Club
description: Sing in a group, learn harmonies, and perform in our fun weekly choir club.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of protecting information, understanding threats, and practicing safe online habits.

title: Clay Animation Workshop
description: A one-time workshop where you'll create your own stop-motion animation using clay characters.

title: Logic and Critical Thinking
description: Develop your reasoning skills through puzzles, paradoxes, and logical analysis.

title: Environmental Science: Ecosystems
description: Study the interactions between organisms and their environments, and the flow of energy.

title: German for Beginners
description: Learn the basics of German grammar and vocabulary for everyday conversation.

title: US Government and Civics
description: An overview of the structure and function of the United States government.

title: Digital Music Production Club
description: Learn to create beats, melodies, and full tracks using digital audio workstation (DAW) software.
